text: Franco Cavallo (26 September 1932 â€“ 9 January 2022) was an Italian competitive sailor. He won a bronze medal in the Star class at the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City in team with Camillo Gargano. He was born in Naples, Italy. Cavallo died in Naples on 9 January 2022, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Naples Category:Italian sailors
title: Franco Cavallo
